name: Restless Knights
description:
---------------------------- RESTLESS KNIGHTS ----------------------------

Winner of the Webster48 Game Jam 2022

Prompt: Duel of the Fates

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

E to Attack

F to Dodge

Mouse to Direct Camera

DISCLAIMER: Do not use your mouse in the main menu. Use keyboard or else game will soft-lock and you will have to restart.

---------------------------------- CREDITS ---------------------------------- 

The Restless Nights Team:

Brian Pham - Programming

Zach Bria - Narrative & Sound Design

Patricia Teal - Character Design & 3D Modeling

Will Eder - World Design & User Interfaces

Special Thanks to Jon B. Honeycutt for assisting in Unity Development
